title: Python
detail: I used Python at General Fusion, and in designing my autonomous Discord Bot for Bridge2Engg.

title: Google Cloud Platform
detail: I used GCP Cloud Run and Compute Engine to host my Discord bot, used both BigQuery in Stock Data Pipeline, and managed VPC subnets and firewalls.

title: C
detail: I used C in creating a Linux Kernel Driver to Monitor CPU usage.

title: C++
detail: I used C++ to render mandelbrot fractals, and with OS projects.

title: CUDA
detail: I used CUDA and ROCm HIP to speed up mandelbrot fractals with GPU parallelization.

title: Docker
detail: I use Docker to containerize my projects, like in the Vehicle Telemetry Server.

title: Raspberry Pi
detail: I develop Kernel Drivers on Raspberry Pis and test server setups.

title: Github
detail: I use GitHub and GitHub Actions for version control and testing for personal projects and at work.
